doc.title: URN

value.content: URN (Uniform Resource Name) is a URI in a standard format, referring to a resource without specifying its location or whether it exists. This example comes from RFC3986: urn:oasis:names:specification:docbook:dtd:xml:4.1.2

value.title: See also
value.content: • URN on Wikipedia
